    • registerSubCommand

      boolean registerSubCommand(@NotNull String command, @NotNull SubCommand subCommand)
      Registers a SubCommand to a Command registered by Duels.
      Parameters:
      command - Name of the parent command to register the SubCommand.
      subCommand - SubCommand to register.
      Returns:
      True if sub command was successfully registered. False otherwise.

    • doSyncAfter

      space.arim.morepaperlib.scheduling.ScheduledTask doSyncAfter(@NotNull Runnable task, long delay)
      Runs the task after delay on server thread.
      Parameters:
      task - Task to run.
      delay - time to delay. 20L = 1s
      Returns:
      BukkitTask executed.
      Since:

    • doSyncRepeat

      space.arim.morepaperlib.scheduling.ScheduledTask doSyncRepeat(@NotNull Runnable task, long delay, long interval)
      Runs the task after delay on server thread repeatedly.
      Parameters:
      task - Task to run.
      delay - time to delay the start of repeat. 20L = 1s
      interval - interval of this task. 20L = 1s
      Returns:
      BukkitTask executed.
      Since:
      3.1.0
